name: Caesar Salad
description: A classic Caesar salad with crisp romaine lettuce, creamy Caesar dressing, freshly grated Parmesan cheese, and crunchy croutons.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: A rich and creamy tomato soup made with fresh tomatoes, basil, and a hint of garlic, served with a dollop of cream.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: An indulgent dessert featuring a warm, gooey chocolate center encased in a rich chocolate cake, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
